page.title: 19FAIRLINE MARINE, OUNDLE
page.content: This is now the largest boat - building company of its sort in Britain. Ten different sizes of luxury motor cruisers are built from 21ft. to 50ft.long. 200 people are employed. The hulls are hand-moulded using brushes and rollers and everything down to the instruments and carpets is fitted before a completed boat leaves the premises. Materials and equipment (glass cloth, resin, wood, engines and electrical equipment) are bought from all over the world. Craftsmen are trained at the factory, and are usually recruited from the building and motor trades. Each boat is built to order, and they are sold in Britain and Europe, particularly to the Mediterranean countries.
